table.name: iod2025_tbl
table.description: Index of Deprivation (IoD) 2025 File 7 - all ranks, scores, deciles, and population denominators by LSOA (England)

column.name: lsoa_cd
column.description: LSOA code (2021)

column.name: lsoa_nm
column.description: LSOA name (2021)

column.name: la_cd
column.description: Local Authority District code (2024)

column.name: la_nm
column.description: Local Authority District name (2024)

column.name: imd_score
column.description: Index of Multiple Deprivation (IMD) Score

column.name: imd_rank
column.description: Index of Multiple Deprivation (IMD) Rank (where 1 is most deprived)

column.name: imd_decile
column.description: Index of Multiple Deprivation (IMD) Decile (where 1 is most deprived 10% of LSOAs)

column.name: income_score
column.description: Income Score (rate)

column.name: income_rank
column.description: Income Rank (where 1 is most deprived)

column.name: income_decile
column.description: Income Decile (where 1 is most deprived 10% of LSOAs)
